entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:46 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 11:46 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming east 20 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
